tasks.label: Unity: Run Tests
args: $unity = 'C:\Program Files\Unity\Hub\Editor\6000.2.15f1\Editor\Unity.exe'; $results = (Join-Path '${workspaceFolder}' 'TestResults/results.xml'); $log = (Join-Path '${workspaceFolder}' 'TestResults/Editor.log'); New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path (Join-Path '${workspaceFolder}' 'TestResults') | Out-Null; Remove-Item -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue $results, $log; & $unity -batchmode -nographics -projectPath '${workspaceFolder}' -runTests -testPlatform editmode -testResults $results -logFile $log -quit -debugCodeOptimization; $code = $LASTEXITCODE; if (Test-Path $log) { Get-Content -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue $log -Tail 40 | Write-Host }; if (!(Test-Path $results)) { Write-Warning 'No results.xml generated.' }; exit $code
